description: A huge program of work is underway to improve and extend Melbourne's road and rail network. While we work there will be major disruptions in Melbourne’s west and east from Friday 29 August to Friday 5 September 2025.

title: Major works this spring
description: Work on major transport infrastructure projects may impact the way you travel around Melbourne and across the state.

title: Major delays this weekend in the east
description: A huge program of work is currently underway to upgrade the Eastern Freeway and M80 Ring Road. While we work there will be major disruptions in Melbourne’s east from Friday 5 September to Monday 8 September 2025.

title: Public transport for the 2025 AFL Season
Routes 831 and 928 going more places, more often
description: From 24 August 2025, routes 831 and 928 will travel to more places, more often, with 366 extra weekly trips across both routes.

title: Crown Makybe Diva Stakes Raceday
description: Public transport for Crown Makybe Diva Stakes Raceday: Saturday 13 September 2025

title: Spring Classics Preview Day
description: Public transport for Spring Classics Preview Day: Sunday 21 September 2025

title: Free travel for Carers during National Carers Week 2025
description: Victorian Carers can explore Melbourne and regional Victoria with free travel during National Carers Week from Sunday 12 October to Saturday 18 October 2025.

title: Major delays this weekend in the north-east
description: Major works are underway this weekend to realign the M80 interchange as part of the North East Link Project. While we work, there will be major disruptions  from 7.30pm, Friday 19 September to 5:30am Monday 22 September 2025.
